title: Tickboard Lit/Shoelace Migration - Phase 4: Polish
description: Add polish features: toast notifications, activity feed, keyboard navigation, mobile responsive layout with tabs, and PWA service worker.
notes:
2026-01-19 22:40 - Completed tick-toast-stack component [5ng]. Toast API: window.showToast({ message, variant, duration }) or dispatch 'show-toast' CustomEvent. Variants: primary (blue), success (green), warning (yellow), danger (red). Default 5s auto-dismiss. Component placed in tick-board.ts after tick-header. Type declarations added to global Window interface.
2026-01-19 22:45 - Completed activity feed [2pg]. Activity API: fetchActivity(limit) returns Activity[] with ts, tick, action, actor, epic, data fields. tick-activity-feed component uses sl-dropdown with bell icon, tracks unread via localStorage. Listens for 'activity-update' window event from SSE. Clicks dispatch 'activity-click' to open tick in drawer.
2026-01-19 22:48 - Completed keyboard navigation [azu]. Shortcuts: j/k (down/up), h/l (left/right), Enter (open drawer), Esc (close/clear focus), n (create), / (search), ? (help). State tracked in tick-board via focusedColumnIndex and focusedTickIndex. tick-column passes focused-tick-id attribute to tick-card. Focused cards show blue ring (box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px var(--blue)) and auto-scroll into view via scrollIntoView(). Keyboard events ignored when sl-input/sl-textarea/sl-select is focused.
2026-01-19 22:51 - Completed mobile responsive layout [slh]. Three breakpoints implemented: â‰¤480px uses sl-tab-group with 5 tabs (icon + badge count), hamburger menu opens filter drawer from left; 481-768px uses horizontal scroll with scroll-snap-type:x mandatory; >768px uses 5-column grid. Detail drawer is 100vw on mobile with 44px min-height touch targets. Tab imports added to main.ts (tab-group, tab, tab-panel).
2026-01-19 22:55 - Completed PWA service worker [20t]. manifest.json at /public/ with icons at root paths (not /static/). sw.js implements: stale-while-revalidate for static/navigation, network-first with offline fallback for API (returns cached with X-Offline header or 503 JSON error), cache-first for Shoelace icons. SW registration in main.ts shows update toast via window.showToast(). Index.html has manifest link, theme-color #1e1e2e, apple-touch-icon, iOS PWA meta tags. Cache names: tickboard-v2, tickboard-static-v2.
